=============
Installation
=============

Dependencies
------------
**MapLapse** is built on top of geopandas_, fiona_, pyproj_, rtree_, shapely_, 
numpy_, pandas_, and matplotlib_.

Virtual Environment
-------------------
It is prefered to use a virtual environment for working with this package.
Use Anaconda_ or Miniconda_ to create a seperate environment and then 
install the package and its dependencies there.

.. code-block:: console

    conda create --name maplapse python=3
    conda activate maplapse

PyPi
-------
Install the `maplapse` using `pip`. It should work with `Windows`, 
`Mac` and `Linux`.

.. code-block:: console

    pip install maplapse

.. _fiona: https://github.com/Toblerity/Fiona

.. _rtree: https://github.com/Toblerity/rtree
.. _shapely: https://shapely.readthedocs.io/en/stable/manual.html
.. _numpy: https://numpy.org/
.. _pandas: https://pandas.pydata.org/
.. _matplotlib: https://matplotlib.org
.. _Anaconda: https://www.anaconda.com/
.. _Miniconda: https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/miniconda.html
